titles.title: Plant Genetic Conservation Center Act
To make appropriations for fiscal year 2002 for the establishment and operation of a plant genetic conservation center.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: 5/25/2001--Introduced. Plant Genetic Conservation Center Act - Appropriates FY 2002 funds for the establishment and operation of a plant genetic conservation program, including construction and maintenance of a temperature-controlled facility.
